title: All Sports Score Keeper
summary: Great tool for sport scoring for players, coaches, school teachers & parents.
description: Keep track of the score while you play or watch your favorite match with this easy to use sport score keeping app for Android phones, tablets and smartwatches.All Sports Score Keeper is a great tool for sport players, coaches, school teachers, parents and can even be used to score official matches.All Sports Score Keeper (former TennisScoreboard) reinvents score keeping with "swipe away / towards yourself" concept: simply swipe away from yourself (swipe up) to give a point to the opponent; or swipe towards yourself (swipe down) to give yourself a point. All the scores are being calculated automatically and are available to you at a glance with "always on" display. Undo and reset functions make it easy to undo any mistakenly awarded points or reset the score completely to start a new match. Supports the following sports:- Tennis, - Table tennis, - Squash, - Badminton, - Volleyball, - Fistball,- Simple Scoring - for simple scoring of goals, points etc.  Each of the sports, where supported, have options to choose how many games / sets are in a match.  Each choice operates on the "best out of" method. So if you choose 5 sets in a Tennis match - the winner will be the first player who wins 3 sets.In squash you are able to change scoring between Modern (PARS) and English system. In Modern scoring system - games are played to 11 and players must win by two clear points. That is, if the score reaches 10–10, play continues until one player wins by two points. In English scoring system - first player to reach 9 points wins the game. However, if the score reaches 8–8, the player who was first to reach 8 decides whether the game will be played to 9, or to 10. If you are playing to 9 and either player has reached 9 points, swipe left to end the game and a new game will start automatically. If you are playing to 10 - continue scoring as usual by swiping up / down.Choose 11 or 21-point scoring system for Table Tennis.Features include: - Score keeping with "swipe away / towards yourself" concept - Automatic score calculation - Support for tie break in Tennis (at 6 / 6 set score) (PRO) - Support for deuce in Tennis and other sports - Options for changing how many sets / games are to be played during a match. (PRO) - Scoring system choices for Squash (Modern or English) (PRO)  - Scoring system choices for Table Tennis (11 or 21-point) (PRO)  - Options to for changing how the last / decider set is scored in Tennis (7 or 10-point tiebreak) (PRO)  - Unlimited scoring in Simple mode (PRO) - Undo - step by step undo each point (PRO) - Haptic feedback - the watch vibrates to acknowledge your input (PRO) - Ambient mode - to save your screen and battery (PRO) (wearable only) - Options to enable / disable haptic feedback and ambient mode (PRO) - Options to show current time and or match time on the main scoring screen (PRO) - Launch app from phone - launch All Sports Score Keeper on your watch from your phone - Long press to access Settings menu or exit the app (wearable only)PRO features are available via a one-off in-app purchase.All Sports Score Keeper is compatible with both square and round watch faces as well as android phones and tablets.Warning: All Sports Score Keeper is NOT compatible with Samsung Gear smartwatches or any smartwatches that don't run Android Wear.
descriptionHTML:
Keep track of the score while you play or watch your favorite match with this easy to use sport score keeping app for Android phones, tablets and smartwatches.


All Sports Score Keeper is a great tool for sport players, coaches, school teachers, parents and can even be used to score official matches.


All Sports Score Keeper (former TennisScoreboard) reinvents score keeping with "swipe away / towards yourself" concept: simply swipe away from yourself (swipe up) to give a point to the opponent; or swipe towards yourself (swipe down) to give yourself a point. All the scores are being calculated automatically and are available to you at a glance with "always on" display. Undo and reset functions make it easy to undo any mistakenly awarded points or reset the score completely to start a new match.


Supports the following sports:
- Tennis,
- Table tennis,
- Squash,
- Badminton,
- Volleyball,
- Fistball,
- Simple Scoring - for simple scoring of goals, points etc.


Each of the sports, where supported, have options to choose how many games / sets are in a match. Each choice operates on the "best out of" method. So if you choose 5 sets in a Tennis match - the winner will be the first player who wins 3 sets.


In squash you are able to change scoring between Modern (PARS) and English system.
In Modern scoring system - games are played to 11 and players must win by two clear points. That is, if the score reaches 10–10, play continues until one player wins by two points.
In English scoring system - first player to reach 9 points wins the game. However, if the score reaches 8–8, the player who was first to reach 8 decides whether the game will be played to 9, or to 10. If you are playing to 9 and either player has reached 9 points, swipe left to end the game and a new game will start automatically. If you are playing to 10 - continue scoring as usual by swiping up / down.


Choose 11 or 21-point scoring system for Table Tennis.


Features include:
- Score keeping with "swipe away / towards yourself" concept
- Automatic score calculation
- Support for tie break in Tennis (at 6 / 6 set score) (PRO)
- Support for deuce in Tennis and other sports
- Options for changing how many sets / games are to be played during a match. (PRO)
- Scoring system choices for Squash (Modern or English) (PRO)
- Scoring system choices for Table Tennis (11 or 21-point) (PRO)
- Options to for changing how the last / decider set is scored in Tennis (7 or 10-point tiebreak) (PRO)
- Unlimited scoring in Simple mode (PRO)
- Undo - step by step undo each point (PRO)
- Haptic feedback - the watch vibrates to acknowledge your input (PRO)
- Ambient mode - to save your screen and battery (PRO) (wearable only)
- Options to enable / disable haptic feedback and ambient mode (PRO)
- Options to show current time and or match time on the main scoring screen (PRO)
- Launch app from phone - launch All Sports Score Keeper on your watch from your phone
- Long press to access Settings menu or exit the app (wearable only)


PRO features are available via a one-off in-app purchase.


All Sports Score Keeper is compatible with both square and round watch faces as well as android phones and tablets.


Warning: All Sports Score Keeper is NOT compatible with Samsung Gear smartwatches or any smartwatches that don't run Android Wear.
comments: Great for tennis, turn off ambient mode so you don't have to double swipe to add a score(will consume more battery)
Cool app but the buttons for Undo and Reset don't get registered on Moto 360 2nd gen watch. Would be great to have score reset option in the settings - now I have to restart the app each time.
The app is simple and works fine but is there a way to store the match results for future reference?
Payed and was unable to use my s2 smart watch. There are no intructions. 2.99 i spend fpr nothing !
Perfect Simple to use. Ideal and quick whilst playing a match.
recentChanges: - New option for Tennis: Alternative Scoring - score last / decider set as a 7 or 10-point tiebreak.
- Support for Android 7.1.1 and various bug fixes
